snippet: The rally on Wall Street contrasted with price declines in European and Asian stock markets. The S.&P. was up 1.2 percent, the Dow 1.1 percent.
lead_paragraph: The rally on Wall Street contrasted with price declines in European and Asian stock markets. The S.&P. was up 1.2 percent, the Dow 1.1 percent.

headline.main: Market Rises on Hint of Easing Tension in Ukraine
headline.print_headline: Market Rises on Hint of Easing Tension in Ukraine
